ComicInfo.Series: Jim Henson's The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance
ComicInfo.Summary:
An all-new arc presenting the origin story of All-Maudra Mayrin, Gelfling leader and pivotal character from Netflix's The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance. Introducing a new creative team of writer Matthew Erman (Long Lost) and artist Jo Cheol-Hong (Beastlands). Mayrin takes her place as the leader of all Gelfling clans, but she feels unprepared for the great responsibility before her. When whispers of a Gelfling rebellion reach her, she must decide who she can trust -- and if she herself is truly worthy of this responsibility.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Mona Finden | 1 | B | Connecting Variant Cover | Kelly Matthews & Nichole Matthews | 2 | Var | Variant Cover | Jen Bartel & Jake Wyatt | 3 | Var | Variant Cover | Jen Bartel & Jake Wyatt | 4 |
